item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Kingsley Amis
item.description: "Consciousness was upon him before he could get out of the way." -- Kingsley Amis

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Bernard Malamud
item.description: "There comes a time in a man's life when to get where he has to go--if there are no doors or windows--he walks through a wall." -- Bernard Malamud

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "I'm not young enough to know everything." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Katherine Anne Porter
item.description: "The past is never where you think you left it." -- Katherine Anne Porter

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Washington Irving
item.description: "A mother is the truest friend we have, when trials heavy and sudden fall upon us; when adversity takes the place of prosperity; when friends desert us; when trouble thickens around us, still will she cling to us, and endeavor by her kind precepts and counsels to dissipate the clouds of darkness, and cause peace to return to our hearts." -- Washington Irving

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "There is no place like home." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "O, to be sure, we laugh less and play less and wear uncomfortable disguises like adults, but beneath the costume is the child we always are, whose needs are simple, whose daily life is still best described by fairy tales." -- Leo Rosten

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "A man who procrastinates in his choosing will inevitably have his choice made for him by circumstance." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Brian Selznick
item.description: "Ben wished the world was organized by the Dewey decimal system. That way you'd be able to find whatever you were looking for." -- Brian Selznick

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Do a loony-goony dance 'Cross the kitchen floor, Put something silly in the world That ain't been there before." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations." -- Oscar Wilde
